notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Research into alternative sources of omega-3 at the University of Stirling and Rothamsted Research was funded by the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC), grant numbers BB/J001252/1 and BB/N012615/1. Research into the application of novel omega-3 sources in salmon feeds at the University of Stirling, Rothamsted Research, and the Norwegian University of Science and Technology was funded by the Research Council of Norway, Havbruk Programme Project no. 245327. The APC was funded by the University of Stirling.
